problems.problem: Confusing subscription purchase & trial flow that led to unexpected or duplicate charges (trial not applied; subscription options hidden until after purchase).
example_reviews: i wanted to make use of the 7-day trial and click on the “trial” checkbox... i was immediately charged the $59 and my subscription didn’t show the free trial.
i cannot find a way to unsubscribe anywhere inside the app or on the developer website... i’m afraid i’m going to be charged whether i like the app or not.

problems.problem: Perceived high membership cost / affordability concerns (membership seen as unnecessary or too expensive for teens).
example_reviews: there is an option to get a membership which i think is pointless because you can do so much without it. and it’s $40/month... for a 14 year old that’s a little much.
there are monthly options and a $19 annual option available through the app store, but i was only able to access that screen after making the in-app purchase.

problems.problem: Women’s workout images are poor / misleading and appear inequitable compared to men's images (undermines confidence in program).
example_reviews: the women's pictures are highly unsatisfactory and fail to demonstrate any progress... it's difficult for me to believe that these workouts are effective.
there is a clear discrepancy when comparing the women's images to those of men, which raises concerns of sexism.

problems.problem: Request for a nutrition/diet feature (diet plans or guidance based on body weight / BMI).
example_reviews: i believe that a dietary area based on body weight and bmi index would be a great addition to this app.
it would be great for people like me who are trying to put on some healthy pounds.

problems.problem: Users want the ability to create/save custom personal programs (beyond editing existing ones).
example_reviews: create your own personal program. yes, you can edit existing ones for your own but i want to keep those.
i want to keep existing ones while building my own personal program.

problems.problem: App does not auto-pause on incoming calls (workout only pauses when hitting home button).
example_reviews: program needs to pause when a call comes in. it will pause if you hit the home button but it should auto-pause on incoming calls.

problems.problem: Duplicate or incorrectly labeled exercises in workout plans (same exercise repeated under different names / repeated within a day).
example_reviews: sometimes when the workout happens and it goes into rest the same workout i just did shows up as something else but the name changed.
on arm in 30 day workout, i did intermediate arm and so on... for each day i did the same part twice.

problems.problem: Full-body program may not provide sufficient leg work for some users (content imbalance).
example_reviews: the full body doesn't really hit the legs enough.
both programs take about 25 minutes total... the full body doesn't really hit the legs enough.

problems.problem: Users request better ad-based incentives (rewards for supporting app by watching or tapping ads).
example_reviews: there is an ad button you can press, if you want to support them... you should make a reward for a certain amount of times the user taps the button.
